item.title: handling mysql permissions
item.description: Handling MySQL users and permissions grant all privileges on <gcc>.* to '<gcc>'@'localhost' identified by '<password'; grant all privileges on <gcc>.* to '<gcc>'@'<FQN_ROR_hostname> ' identified by '<password'; Resources 13.7.5.17 SHOW GRANTS Syntax
